attributes.action: Establish a Government of National Unity
attributes.additional_details:
In light of the many challenges facing the nation both domestic and international and in order for politicians to regain the confidence of the electorate it is time for a Government of National Unity!

Political ideology is clearly getting in the way of finding solutions to the many problems the country faces.  We need politicians to be leaders and put aside party interests for the sake of the whole of the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: Given the many challenges that are now facing this country, is it not time for politicians to work together for the benefit of the whole of the United Kingdom and form a Government of National Unity.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625216
